attributes.additional_details: After seeing the 2nd family in a matter of months stood at the roadside of the A6 between the A14 roundabout, Kettering and the junction of Burton Latimer, mourning the loss of a family member due to an accident. It's about time the local council did something to make it safer by placing some sort of bollards along the stretch of the road! There have been countless accidents, some fatal, and some drastic measures need to be taken to make the road safe!!

rejection.details: This will be for the local traffic authority.
